item.title: Drifting Card Algorithm
item.description: .entry-content::after { /* keep floating content in flow, have div respond */ content: ""; clear: both; display: table; } #demo { display: inline; float: right; } Aim: To have cards drift to a predefined grid point while under the criteria of: Have no crossing paths
